question:
[Manuel] and his Aunt [Judy] flew first class [Ethel] asked her daughter, [Leila], if she would like to go to a movie with her on Saturday night. [Oscar] got his son, [William], a car for his birthday. [William] and his uncle [Gordon] went to the county fair and went on the ferris wheel [Larry] took his son [Gordon] and his daughter [Leila] out for pizza. [Kenneth]'s nephew [Oscar] was happy to hear that he will be arriving at the airport later tonight. [Michele] wanted to do something special for her son, [Manuel], on his fifth birthday. She asked her husband [Kenneth] for gift ideas.
Question: How is [Judy] related to [Ethel]?
